data.title: This place closed down, but it WAS the best ever
data.text: Hopefully, someone will revive this standard for "where to go when there's nowhere else to go at 1:00 am." Cheap drinks and a real bar atmosphere. Can't ask for anything more.

data.title: This bar has closed
data.text: This bar has closed. But when it was open it was an interesting dive bar. The clientele were a fascinating variety from all walks of life. Drinks good, food a little too salty and greasy for my taste. Staff there were great.
